data.title: Convert Central Time to Madrid, Spain Time
data.meta_description: Quickly convert Central European Time (CET) to time in Madrid, Spain with this easy-to-use, modern time zone converter.
data.text:
Converting CET to Madrid Time

This time zone converter lets you visually and very quickly convert CET to Madrid, Spain time and vice-versa. Simply mouse over the colored hour-tiles and glance at the hours selected by the column... and done!

CET stands for Central European Time. Madrid, Spain time is 0 hours ahead of CET. So, when it is it will be
